parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and the response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The string that allows you to search for servers in fuzzy match mode. You can enter a server name or IP address.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The protection status of the server that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **on**: protected
*   **off**: unprotected
